title: What crypto to buy now: Cardano (ADA) may face challenges as investors flock to Mutuum Finance (MUTM) for gains
description: Cardano (ADA) has dipped sharply by 12% this week. ADA breached the $0.66 support amid broader crypto market pressures. Bitcoin’s slide toward $104,000 has softened altcoin liquidity. This has pushed ADA into consolidation between $0.65 and $0.70.  Moreover, Large holders sold 40 million ADA recently, while others accumulated 140 to 200 million. Thus creating choppy […]
